restaurantDescription: Visit your local Bahama Breeze Island Grille in Tukwila, Washington to experience handcrafted tropical drinks, Caribbean-inspired food, and a vibrant island atmosphere. Our bartenders make exotic and legendary cocktails with fresh juices, sugar cane, and island expertise. Music plays a major part of our restaurant's fun island-vibe. Our songs are artfully curated, and we regularly schedule live music performances for your entertainment. We are conveniently located near I-5 and Westfield Southcenter Mall. Visit the Bahama Breeze Island Grille location at 15700 Southcenter Parkway today to enjoy Caribbean dining in a warm and welcoming atmosphere.
